name: Speed+
description:
Get ready for a very fierce race, lots of new places and enemies waiting to be conquered. Defeat all your enemies and win races to get unique and cool cars

Arrow Up/Down/Left/Right key to move

V to change camera position

Space to brake

  • Download .zip file 
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on SpeedPlus.exe / SpeedPlus.app
  • Enjoy
